entity.name: Discussion
entity.query: select d.DiscussionID * 10 + 1 as UniqueID, d.*, 'Discussion' as DocType from GDN_Discussion d;
entity.deltaImportQuery: select d.DiscussionID * 10 + 1 as UniqueID, d.*, 'Discussion' as DocType from GDN_Discussion d where d.DiscussionID = '${dataimporter.delta.DiscussionID}';
entity.deltaQuery: select d.DiscussionID from GDN_Discussion d where d.DateInserted > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}';

entity.name: Comment
entity.query: select c.CommentID * 10 + 1 as UniqueID, c.*, d.Name, d.CategoryID, 'Comment' as DocType from GDN_Comment c inner join GDN_Discussion d on c.DiscussionID = d.DiscussionID;
entity.deltaImportQuery: select c.CommentID * 10 + 1 as UniqueID, c.*, d.Name, d.CategoryID, 'Comment' as DocType from GDN_Comment c inner join GDN_Discussion d on c.DiscussionID = d.DiscussionID where c.CommentID = '${dataimporter.delta.CommentID}';
entity.deltaQuery: select c.CommentID from GDN_Comment c where c.DateInserted > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}';
